column4: Hey guys, I'm having a partition problem. Whenever I open GParted or the Ubuntu installer integrated partitioner, I am confronted by a blank screen, as it it isn't detecting my drives, any help?
what type of drivers/controller do you have?
I'm running from a live CD, and I have an nvidia card.
You said it wasn't showing your drives right?  Or does the whole screen go blank?
On GParted, everything is greyed out, and in the lower left corner it says that there are no devices detected. I have refreshed multiple times.
What type of drives do you have sata? scsi? ide?  how are they connected to your computer?
Got it early this year, and it's a desktop.
SATA I believe, but I'm not exactly sure.
are you on the computer now so that you can issue commands?
Hegeru: How do I do this?
It says Unable to open l
